mapper.select: select SCHEDULE_ID, SCHEDULE_TYPE, SCHEDULE_CONTENT, SCHEDULE_START, SCHEDULE_END, EMPLOYEE_NUM, COMPANY_NUM, DEPT_NO, IS_ALLDAY, IS_PRIVATE, LOCATION from GRPWR_SCHEDULE where company_num = #{companyNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GRPWR_SCHEDULE ( SCHEDULE_ID, SCHEDULE_TYPE, SCHEDULE_CONTENT, SCHEDULE_START, SCHEDULE_END, EMPLOYEE_NUM, COMPANY_NUM, DEPT_NO, IS_ALLDAY, IS_PRIVATE, LOCATION ) VALUES ( GRPWR_SCHEDULE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{scheduleType}, #{scheduleContent}, #{scheduleStart}, #{scheduleEnd}, #{employeeNum}, #{companyNum}, #{deptNo}, #{isAllday}, #{isPrivate}, #{location} )
